headline: oneZero appoints Asiff Hirji, Former Coinbase & Ameritrade President, to Board of Directors
summary: oneZero, a leading provider of multi-asset enterprise technology solutions for trade execution, pricing, connectivity and risk management for brokers, banks and buy-side market participants, today announced the appointment of Asiff Hirji to its Board of Directors.

headline: U.S. SEC Takes Preliminary Step to Expand Universe of Crypto Custody to State Trusts
summary: Another no-action letter from the agency staff signals the SEC's view that state-chartered trusts are fine for handling digital asset custody.

headline: Clarity Act Would Have Prevented FTX Collapse: Coinbase's Grewal
summary: Paul Grewal, Chief Legal Officer at Coinbase Global urges Congress to move quickly on legislation to define which assets fall under federal rules and what disclosures are required. He claimed the FTX collapse might have been avoided with clearer oversight on "Bloomberg Crypto" with Tim Stenovec and Scarlet Fu.

headline: SEC Pushes Plan to Make Stocks Trade Like Crypto on Blockchain
summary: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is reportedly developing a plan to allow stocks to trade like crypto on the blockchain, treating shares of companies like Apple, Tesla, and Nvidia as digital tokens similar to how cryptocurrencies operate.While the initiative has gained support from crypto exchanges and fintech platforms, ...

headline: REKT BRANDS INC. EXPANDS BEVERAGE ARSENAL WITH REKT ENERGY
summary: Rekt Brands Inc., the consumer brand company blending culture, creativity, and crypto, today announced a new product like with Rekt Energy that will be released in 2025. Rekt Energy will come in both a powdered version and RTD. Co-Founder and CEO Ovie Faruq gave the audiences at Korea Blockchain Week the exclusive sneak peak - watch and listen to the full keynote HERE.

headline: Coinbase Rallies 6.85% As CEO Warns Senate: Don’t Kill Crypto To Save Banks
summary: Following the Federal Reserve’s (FED) rate cut earlier this month, Coinbase’s shares jumped 6.85%, marking a positive start to the week despite persistent bearish headwinds.
